dataSource.title: About This Data
dataSource.description: This dashboard visualizes flood control infrastructure projects across the Philippines. The data includes information about project locations, types, implementing offices, and more. Use the filters in the sidebar to explore specific aspects of the data or use the search functionality to find specific projects.
